instruction:
Given the following job description, create a tailored resume:

Job Title: AI Startup Summer Internship — Sales, Marketing, Engineering

Job Description:
Join Our Mission:
Novo is on a mission to make legal representation more accessible, and this summer, we’re inviting a few sharp, driven interns to join us in Austin, TX.
Whether you're passionate about building software, selling big ideas, or shaping stories that spread, this is your opportunity to work alongside a fast-moving founding team using AI to transform legal tech.
We’re looking for interns in Sales, Marketing, and Engineering who want more than just a résumé line, people who want to build, learn, and own real work that matters.
What You’ll Do:
You'll be working directly with our core team, contributing from day one. Responsibilities will vary by role, but here's a rough idea:
Sales
Research and qualify leads across law firms and legal orgs.
Cold outreach via email, phone, or even door-to-door.
Support product demos, onboarding, and CRM updates.
Learn real-world selling, from messaging to objection handling.
Marketing
Help grow our brand across web, social, and community.
Write content, design assets, and help plan campaigns.
Support SEO, analytics, and channel experiments.
Build content people actually want to read or share.
Engineering
Build features using TypeScript, Node.js, React, and Supabase.
Ship code that supports real users in real court cases.
Prototype internal tools and contribute to our AI stack.
Learn about LLMs, RAG pipelines, and structured data workflows.
Who Should Apply:
You don’t need a fancy title or perfect résumé. If you’ve ever:
Knocked on doors or sold anything in person
Cold-called or cold-emailed someone and got a reply
Grown a social media audience or helped shape a brand
Built side projects (no matter how scrappy)
Tinkered with AI tools like ChatGPT, Midjourney, or LangChain
Taken initiative and figured things out on your own
...then you’re exactly who we’re looking for.
We want people who are smart, resourceful, and ready to learn by doing. No hand-holding. No filler work. Just real problems, real users, and a real team.
Details
Location: In-person in Austin, TX
Duration: Summer 2025 (flexible start and end dates)
Compensation: Paid internship
Perks: Great team, mentorship, and a front-row seat to startup building
Ready to Dive In? If this sounds like your kind of summer, we’d love to hear from you. Tell us what track you’re interested in (Sales, Marketing, Engineering) and what you've built, written, sold, or hacked on.

Please create a tailored resume that highlights relevant skills and experience for this position.
output:
Here is a tailored resume for the AI Startup Summer Internship — Sales, Marketing, Engineering position:

SATHVIK ADDICHARLA
Denton, TX 76207 | sathvikaddicharla@my.unt.edu | +1 (940) 597-5745 | [GitHub] | [LinkedIn]
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Resourceful AI/ML engineer with a startup mindset and experience building real-world AI features using LLMs, LangChain, FAISS, Whisper, and Flask. Skilled in deploying API-driven tools, prototyping quickly, and integrating with cloud infrastructure. Strong contributor to fast-moving teams with a bias toward action, user-first design, and systems that ship. Passionate about using AI to solve tangible problems—especially those in high-stakes, high-impact domains like legal tech.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
AI Tools & Models: OpenAI (GPT-4, Whisper), Hugging Face, LangChain, RAG pipelines
Web & Backend: Python, Flask, FastAPI, REST APIs, Docker, SQL
Frontend & Stack Familiarity: JavaScript, TypeScript (basic), React (basic), Supabase (learning)
Data & Infra: FAISS, JSON, AWS (Lambda, S3), Git, MLflow
Other: GitHub APIs, prompt tuning, async collaboration (Slack, Notion), product prototyping
EDUCATION
Master’s in Data Science
University of North Texas | 04/2024 – 08/2026 | GPA: 3.66/4.0
Bachelor’s in Computer Science – Data Science
VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute of Technology, India | GPA: 8.60/10
EXPERIENCE
AI/ML Engineer Intern
Cantellate Software Pvt Ltd | Hyderabad | 03/2023 – 09/2023
Built a real-time fraud detection API using PyTorch + Flask, deployed on AWS with sub-100ms latency.
Created a retrieval-augmented chatbot using LangChain + OpenAI + FAISS, with prompt config in JSON.
Owned end-to-end dev: from raw data preprocessing (500GB+) to MLflow logging and container deployment.
Collaborated in async remote team; iterated weekly with minimal supervision to hit MVP milestones.
PROJECTS
Startup-Style AI Chatbot (LangChain + OpenAI)
Developed a plug-and-play chatbot with guardrails and prompt memory for small businesses.
Exposed endpoints via FastAPI, with structured config and logging for debugging user interactions.
AI YouTube Summarizer (Whisper + FAISS + Flask)
Used Whisper to transcribe and vector-search transcripts for smart summarization.
Built frontend-ready REST endpoints to plug into CMS or client tools.
Personal Side Project: "AskMyResume"
Weekend hack to let users ask questions about their resumes using GPT and LangChain.
Included GitHub OAuth, file parsing, and retrieval logic.
CERTIFICATIONS & TRAINING
Training LLMs with Your Own Data – DeepLearning.ai
Deep Learning – NPTEL (IIT Ropar)
Google Data Analytics – Coursera
Python for Data Science – Udemy
